BookMe may share your information with third parties in the following scenarios:
These providers may have access to your information for the purpose of conducting tasks on our behalf.
Third-party service providers may be engaged to assist with the operation and maintenance of the Service.
BookMe may share your information with third parties in the following scenarios:

We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to: Booking Information: Information pertinent to the bookings you either make or receive through the Service, encompassing booking specifics, schedules, and financial transaction details.

We may also collect certain information automatically when you use the Service, including: Cookies: The utilization of cookies and similar tracking technologies is employed for the analysis of usage patterns, content personalization, and the enhancement of the user experience.

We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to: Booking Information: Information pertinent to the bookings you either make or receive through the Service, encompassing booking specifics, schedules, and financial transaction details.
We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to:
We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to: Personal Information

We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to: User Content: Content generated or posted on BookMe, such as profile data, availability, and visual media.
